page_content: take-zipWith : {A.a : Agda.Primitive.Level} {A = A₁ : Set A.a} {B.b : Agda.Primitive.Level} {B : Set B.b} {C.c : Agda.Primitive.Level} {C : Set C.c} (n : Agda.Builtin.Nat.Nat) (f : A₁ → B → C) (as : Codata.Guarded.Stream.Stream A₁) (bs : Codata.Guarded.Stream.Stream B) → Codata.Guarded.Stream.take n (Codata.Guarded.Stream.zipWith f as bs) Agda.Builtin.Equality.≡ Data.Vec.Base.zipWith f (Codata.Guarded.Stream.take n as) (Codata.Guarded.Stream.take n bs)

page_content: lookup-transpose : {A.a : Agda.Primitive.Level} {A = A₁ : Set A.a} (n : Agda.Builtin.Nat.Nat) (ass : Agda.Builtin.List.List (Codata.Guarded.Stream.Stream A₁)) → Codata.Guarded.Stream.lookup (Codata.Guarded.Stream.transpose ass) n Agda.Builtin.Equality.≡ Data.List.Base.map (Function.Base.flip Codata.Guarded.Stream.lookup n) ass

metadata.name: lookup-transpose
